name: Gone Fishing [nokia]
description:
Work in progress for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam 4. Originally inspired by the NES classic Black Bass. We'll see if we end up fishing!

First take on the Dragon Ruby Toolkit. Pretty sweet!

Feature progression:

  • A boat!
  • Map goes vroom!
  • Wall says bang!
  • Music makes splash!
  • Now the boat spins!
  • And there's things to catch!
  • And BIG BOYS under certain conditions!
  • There's a fishing pole, and the fish target is now where the lure would be,  as opposed to directly under the boat
  • Boss fish are more exciting to catch. Still looking to filling out fish with sprites rather than blocks
  • The boat has a separate collision map for each direction, giving a better feeling experience.
  • The map is now separated into a collision map, and a decorations layer. This means you can float over certain riffraff and drive behind trees (okay, it's actually in _front_ of at this moment heh)
  • The map decorations are filled out. Though, you can't see most of the detail at this resolution from the boat ; ;

... That's all (for now!)
